name: Minecraft: 15 Year Journey
summary: It’s time for a (literal) trip down memory lane! A lot has happened in these 15 years, so we’ve packed some of our most nostalgic moments, marvelous dimensions, and accidental proudest inventions from our past into a free map by Oreville Studios. The doors to the Minecraft Museum are open and admission is free, so what are you waiting for? Let’s head inside!
